metadata.title: CVE-2023-29546 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When recording the screen while in Private Browsing on Firefox for Androidthe address bar and keyboard were not hidden, potentially leaking sensitiveinformation. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android <112 and Focus for Android < 112.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
